 2003-11542003-07-31,  ,  ,  FAIT, 
ActAppropriation Act No. 2, 2003-2004
Appropriation Act No. 2, 2003-2004
PrecisAppointment of CHRISTOPHER ALEXANDER as Ambassador of Canada to Afghanistan; RODERICK BELL as Ambassador of Canada to the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, with concurrent accreditation to the Republic of Yemen and to the Kingdom of Bahrain; BRIAN DAVIS as Ambassador of Canada to the Syrian Arab Republic; LUCIE EDWARDS as High Commissioner for Canada in the Republic of India, with concurrent accreditation as Ambassador of Canada to the Kingdom of Nepal; BERNARD GIROUX as Ambassador of Canada to the Republic of Chile; MARGARET HUBER as High Commissioner for Canada in the Islamic Republic of Pakistan; ANTHONY KNILL as Consul General of Canada at Miami (United States of America); MICHÈLE LÉVESQUE as Ambassador of Canada to the Republic of Côte d'Ivoire, with concurrent accreditation to the Republic of Niger and to the Republic of Benin; MELVIN MacDONALD as High Commissioner for Canada in Malaysia; ROBERT MACKENZIE as Consul General of Canada at Shanghai (People's Republic of China); PATRICK PARISOT as Ambassador of Canada to the Portuguese Republic; FRANCO PILLARELLA as Ambassador of Canada to Romania, with concurrent accreditation to the Republic of Bulgaria and to the Republic of Moldova; SANDELLE SCRIMSHAW as High Commissioner for Canada in the Republic of South Africa, with concurrent accreditation to the Republic of Mauritius; DONALD SINCLAIR as Ambassador of Canada to the State of Israel; and PETER SUTHERLAND as Ambassador of Canada to the Republic of the Philippines.
